Urho3D::ShaderPrecache Class Reference

Utility class for collecting used shader combinations during runtime for precaching. More...

#include <Urho3D/Graphics/ShaderPrecache.h>

Detailed Description

Utility class for collecting used shader combinations during runtime for precaching.
